name: Haunted Abbey
overview: Your objective is to find Phibe's "Book of Incantations" and collect any treasure in the abbey. Along the way there are various monsters which can be fought with a wide range of weapons and magic. Nothing is obvious and there are puzzles, red herrings and many instances of sudden death. The game has brief location descriptions and a fairly simple parser. It was known as Haunted Abbey on the box and media, and as The Haunted Abbey in-game.
